item.description: President Donald Trump will go to Dover Air Force Base in Delaware on Wednesday for a dignified transfer for the two Iowa National Guard members kille...

item.title: Trump expands travel ban, adding 5 more countries and imposing new limits on others
item.description: The Trump administration is expanding its travel ban to include five more countries and impose new limits on others

item.title: Texas sues utility company to recover damages from historic wildfire
item.description: Texas is suing the utility company whose downed power lines sparked the largest wildfire in state history

item.title: 11 firefighters and 2 others injured after North Carolina house fire and explosion
item.description: North Carolina officials say 11 firefighters and two people were injured in a house fire explosion in the Piedmont region of North Carolina

item.title: Customs officer at JFK airport fires his gun during a freeway fight
